unavailable.heading: Looks like you've caught us at an awkward moment.
unavailable.message: Our store is not currently available. We might be down for maintenance or doing something equally disruptive. Can you come back later?

404.title: Not found
404.subtext_html: The page you were looking for does not exist

coming_soon.thanks: Thanks for your interest! Look out for an email soon.
coming_soon.hook: Enter your email address to receive a one-time notification when we launch.
coming_soon.heading: Shipping January 2021

footer.privacy_message: We never sell your personal information, we like you too much :)

product.price_includes_statement: Price includes sales tax and free shipping where applicable.
product.no_description_html: There is no description for this product. Please check back later. For more information please contact us.
product.substitution_warning: We do our very best to complete the order as described; if unavailable we may substitute up to one brand from the list above.

cart.title: Cart
cart.empty_cart_html: Your cart is empty. Find the perfect item in our collection to change that :)
